title: Rhetorical Reasoning Strategy Transfer Learning Program for Academic Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to effectively analyze multilingual academic materials encountered by current elementary school practitioners in their work. Mobile-optimized content is essential in environments without personal computers.

learning_goals: Learners can infer rhetorical relationships (cause-effect, problem-solution, etc.) in academic texts with 85% accuracy
Learners can apply inferential strategies acquired in L2 (English) to analyze L1 (Korean) texts with 70% or higher accuracy
Learners can flexibly transfer rhetorical reasoning skills across genres (reports, papers, case studies)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
